nodes.text: The Dark Eclipse was a Warlord Heavy Cruiser. It operated in the Dathomir system in 1.5 ABY and later in the Bright Jewel system where it was spotted together with a group of Black Sun starfighters.

The Dark Eclipse  is a starship that first appeared in the space part of Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, where it can be found in the Dathomir system. It also later appeared in the Bright Jewel system when it was added to the game with Chapter 8: The Nova Orion Crisis in January 2008.
